languages.text: "Ценю широту ваших размышлений. В наше время немногие осмеливаются позволить ее себе".

traits.locale_text: "Ценю широту ваших размышлений. В наше время немногие осмеливаются позволить ее себе".

languages.text: "I appreciate your breadth of thinking. In this day and age, few choose to allow themselves such a thing."
languages.original_text: "Ценю широту ваших размышлений. В наше время немногие осмеливаются позволить ее себе".

traits.locale_text: "I appreciate your breadth of thinking. In this day and age, few choose to allow themselves such a thing."
"I appreciate your breadth of thinking. In this day and age, few choose to allow themselves such a thing."
"I appreciate your breadth of thinking. In this day and age, few choose to allow themselves such a thing."
"I appreciate your breadth of thinking. In this day and age, few choose to allow themselves such a thing."
"I appreciate your breadth of thinking. In this day and age, few choose to allow themselves such a thing."

languages.text: 「君の広い視野に感謝する。今の時代、そのようなことを選択しようとする者はほとんどいない」
languages.original_text: "I appreciate your breadth of thinking. In this day and age, few choose to allow themselves such a thing."

traits.locale_text: 「君の広い視野に感謝する。今の時代、そのようなことを選択しようとする者はほとんどいない」

languages.text: “我很感激您的开明。在如今这个时代，很少有人会允许自己这么思考。”
languages.original_text: "I appreciate your breadth of thinking. In this day and age, few choose to allow themselves such a thing."

traits.locale_text: “我很感激您的开明。在如今这个时代，很少有人会允许自己这么思考。”

languages.text: «Aprecio su capacidad de reflexión. En los tiempos que corren, pocos eligen permitirse algo así».
languages.original_text: "I appreciate your breadth of thinking. In this day and age, few choose to allow themselves such a thing."

traits.locale_text: «Aprecio su capacidad de reflexión. En los tiempos que corren, pocos eligen permitirse algo así».

languages.text: « J'apprécie votre ouverture d'esprit. De nos jours, peu de gens s'autorisent ce genre de liberté. »
languages.original_text: "I appreciate your breadth of thinking. In this day and age, few choose to allow themselves such a thing."

traits.locale_text: « J'apprécie votre ouverture d'esprit. De nos jours, peu de gens s'autorisent ce genre de liberté. »

languages.text: "Ich schätze Euren breiten Denkansatz. In diesen Zeiten erlauben sich so etwas nur wenige."
languages.original_text: "I appreciate your breadth of thinking. In this day and age, few choose to allow themselves such a thing."

traits.locale_text: "Ich schätze Euren breiten Denkansatz. In diesen Zeiten erlauben sich so etwas nur wenige."

languages.text: "Açık fikirliliğinizi takdir ettim doğrusu. Günümüzde pek az kişi kendine böyle bir hürriyet tanıyor."
languages.original_text: "I appreciate your breadth of thinking. In this day and age, few choose to allow themselves such a thing."

traits.locale_text: "Düşünce genişliğinizi takdir ediyorum. Günümüzde pek az kişi kendilerini bu lükse uygun görüyor."
